original_text: (These men had earlier seen Paul in the city with a man called Trophimus. Trophimus was a Gentile who came from Ephesus. They thought that Paul had brought Trophimus into the temple. That is why they shouted bad things against Paul.)
korean_text: 이는 그들이 전에 에베소 사람 드로비모가 바울과 함께 시내에 있음을 보고 바울이 그를 성전에 데리고 들어간 줄로 생각함이러라

sentences.original_text: These men had earlier seen Paul in the city
sentences.korean_translation: 이 남자들은 도시에서 바울을 이전에 보았습니다

sentences.original_text: They thought that Paul had brought Trophimus into the temple
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 바울이 드로비모를 성전으로 데려왔다고 생각했습니다

sentences.original_text: That is why they shouted bad things against Paul
sentences.korean_translation: 그것이 그들이 바울에게 나쁜 말들을 외친 이유입니다
